title: GLOBO's Dancing Refrigerator
setup: GLOBO opens fridge for midnight snack
transformation: Refrigerator starts salsa dancing with food items
surprise: Fridge reveals it's been taking dance classes with the microwave!
imagePrompt: Cartoon refrigerator dancing salsa with anthropomorphic food items, colorful and fun

title: Invisible Spanish Teacher
english: The teacher is invisible! Where is he?
setup: GLOBO sits down for Spanish lesson
transformation: Invisible teacher throws books and chalk everywhere
surprise: Teacher becomes visible - it's a tiny hamster with globe sunglasses!
imagePrompt: Floating books and chalk, tiny hamster wearing globe-shaped sunglasses, magical classroom

title: Flying Taco Truck
spanish: ¡El camión de tacos vuela! ¡Los tacos caen del cielo!
english: The taco truck flies! Tacos fall from the sky!
setup: Marco orders from normal taco truck
transformation: Truck sprouts wings and starts flying
surprise: Truck lands on cloud made of tortillas - taco heaven!
imagePrompt: Flying food truck with wings, tacos raining down, cloud made of tortillas

title: Self-Stirring Coffee Mug
english: The cup has arms! It mixes everything!
transformation: Mug grows tiny arms and stirs everything
surprise: Mug realizes it's been stirring hot chocolate, not coffee!
imagePrompt: Coffee mug with cute little arms stirring kitchen items, breakfast chaos

title: Upside-Down City Drive
spanish: ¡El mundo está al revés! ¡Los carros vuelan!
english: The world is upside down! Cars are flying!
transformation: City flips upside down, cars drive on clouds
surprise: GLOBO realizes he's been holding the map upside down!
imagePrompt: Upside-down city, cars on clouds, buildings hanging from sky, surreal

title: Spanish Dictionary Revolt
english: The words argue! Who is right?
transformation: Words float off pages and start arguing
surprise: Words form a union and demand better pronunciation!
imagePrompt: Floating word bubbles arguing, dictionary pages alive, letters rearranging
